title: Elegant Diamond Pendant Necklace - Adhunik Haaram
features: This modern pendant features two connected, cushion-cut Polki diamond pendants set in a halo of brilliant round-cut diamonds. The delicate gold chain complements the pendants' contemporary design, while retaining an ethnic touch through the polki diamonds. The setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship, ensuring light reflection and maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: and engagements. Can also be worn for festive occasions like Diwali or a Sangeet with contemporary attire.
description: This pendant necklace perfectly blends modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian gemstone choices. The cushion cut Polki diamonds add a touch of ethnic heritage while the brilliant cut diamond halo setting adds a modern sparkle, creating a timeless piece. The high-quality gold ensures durability and lasting value. Its lightweight design makes it comfortable to wear all day or night.
